metadata.title: Mobile & Tablet Responsive Layouts for 3D Solution Theater

story.asA: mobile or tablet user visiting the homepage
story.iWant: to experience an optimized, touch-friendly version of the Solutions Theater with device-appropriate layouts, touch gestures, and performance-optimized animations
story.soThat: I can explore Cre8tive AI's services with a premium mobile experience tailored to my device's capabilities and screen size

phase.title: Mobile Layout Foundation
phase.task: Create responsive layout logic (useIsMobile hook, conditional rendering, vertical stack)
Implement mobile touch interactions (tap, double-tap, long-press, swipe gestures)
Test: Mobile layout renders correctly, touch gestures work, no 3D on mobile

phase.title: Mobile Animations
phase.task: Create useMobileScrollReveal hook (simplified GSAP, fade-up animation)
Performance optimizations (1K particles, disable video, responsive images)
Reduced motion support (detect prefers-reduced-motion, instant animations)
Test: Animations smooth (≥45fps), reduced motion works, network optimized

phase.title: Tablet Layout
phase.task: Two-column grid implementation (useIsTablet hook, Tailwind grid, reduced perspective)
Reduced 3D effects (maxTilt 8°, shadow 20→40px, scale 1.0→1.03)
Hybrid touch/mouse interactions (tap sticky hover, double-tap navigate, mouse hover)
Test: Tablet layout correct, 3D subtle, touch+mouse both work, ≥50fps

phase.title: Device Orientation & Gyroscope
phase.task: Device orientation tilt (useDeviceOrientation hook, ±5° range, 0-10px parallax)
Orientation change handling (portrait/landscape layouts, ScrollTrigger.refresh())
Test: Gyroscope tilt works (iPhone), orientation changes smooth, no layout breaks

phase.title: Cross-Platform Polish
phase.task: Breakpoint transitions (300ms ease-out, CLS <0.1, debounced resize)
Touch target optimization (≥44x44px iOS, ≥48x48px Android, visual feedback)
Network optimization (saveData detection, 3G handling, lazy load 200px margin)
Test: Breakpoint transitions smooth, touch targets accessible, network-aware

phase.title: Integration & QA
phase.task: Integration with existing theater (update SolutionTheater.tsx, coordinate GSAP)
Device testing matrix (iPhone, Samsung, iPad, responsive viewports)
Build validation (TypeScript, ESLint, production build, bundle size)
Test: All devices work, responsive behavior correct, build clean

ac.title: Vertical Stack Layout
ac.then: cards display in vertical stack: No 3D perspective (disable PerspectiveContainer), single column layout, card width 100% viewport width minus padding, each card occupies full viewport height on initial view
ac.and: AI Agents card remains filtered out

ac.title: Touch Interactions
ac.given: user interacts with cards on mobile
ac.then: touch interactions work: Single tap = expand preview to fullscreen (modal-like), double tap = navigate to service page, long press (500ms) = show CTA options (Cal.com link), swipe left/right = navigate between cards (Framer Motion drag)

ac.title: Simplified Animations
ac.then: simplified animations apply: Simple fade-up reveal (opacity 0→1, translateY 40→0), no 3D tilt effects (disabled on mobile), no mouse tracking (touch-only device), duration 400ms (faster than desktop 800ms)

ac.title: Device Orientation Tilt (Optional Enhancement)
ac.then: cards respond with subtle parallax: Tilt range ±5° (gentler than desktop ±15°), parallax offset 0-10px (vs desktop 0-40px), spring-back on device level 200ms
ac.and: fallback: static cards if gyroscope unavailable

ac.title: Mobile Performance Optimization
ac.then: performance optimizations apply: Particle count 1K particles (vs desktop 5K), video previews disabled by default (load on tap), image assets mobile-optimized srcset (480w, 800w), lazy loading cards below fold load on scroll
ac.and: frame rate maintains ≥45fps on mid-range devices

ac.title: Two-Column Grid Layout
ac.given: user views site on tablet (768px ≤ viewport < 1024px)
ac.then: layout shows 2-column grid: Grid 2 columns 1.5 rows (3 cards total), gap 32px (vs mobile 16px, desktop 48px), perspective 800px (reduced from desktop 1200px), cards side-by-side equal width

ac.title: Reduced 3D Effects
ac.then: subtle 3D effects apply: Perspective 800px (vs desktop 1200px), tilt range ±8° (vs desktop ±15°, mobile disabled), shadow blur 20→40px on hover (vs desktop 40→60px), scale hover 1.0→1.03 (vs desktop 1.0→1.05)
ac.and: reduced depth for tablet form factor

ac.title: Touch + Mouse Hybrid Interactions
ac.given: tablet device (supports both touch and mouse)
ac.then: both input methods work: Touch tap = hover state (sticky), double-tap = navigate; Mouse (iPad Magic Keyboard) hover effects, click = navigate; Drag gesture swipe left/right to scroll cards (if overflow)

ac.title: Tablet Scroll Reveal
ac.then: staggered reveal with reduced complexity: Card 1 0ms delay opacity 0→1 scale 0.9→1 translateY 60→0 (600ms), Card 2 100ms delay opacity 0→1 scale 0.9→1 translateY 60→0 (600ms), Card 3 200ms delay opacity 0→1 scale 0.9→1 translateY 60→0 (600ms)

ac.title: Tablet Performance Balance
ac.then: balanced performance optimizations: Particle count 2K (vs mobile 1K, desktop 5K), video previews lazy load auto-play on viewport entry, image assets tablet srcset (800w, 1200w), 3D transforms reduced complexity (fewer shadow layers)

ac.title: Responsive Breakpoint Transitions
ac.given: user resizes browser window or rotates device
ac.then: layout transitions smoothly: Mobile ↔ Tablet grid reflow (1→2 columns), Tablet ↔ Desktop perspective activation (800px→1200px), no layout shift (CLS <0.1), transition duration 300ms with ease-out

ac.title: Touch Target Accessibility
ac.then: touch targets meet minimum sizes: Card tap area ≥44x44px (iOS) ≥48x48px (Android), CTA buttons ≥48x48px with 8px spacing, swipe hit zones full card width
ac.and: visual feedback on touch (100ms response time)

ac.title: Orientation Change Handling
ac.then: layout adapts correctly: Mobile portrait vertical stack (default), Mobile landscape horizontal carousel with snap scroll, Tablet portrait 2-column grid, Tablet landscape 3-column grid (desktop-like)
ac.and: GSAP animations re-initialize on orientation change

ac.title: Reduced Motion Respect (Mobile)
ac.given: mobile user has enabled reduce motion (iOS/Android settings)
ac.then: animations simplify: Instant opacity change (no fade), no translateY movement, no tilt/parallax effects, static image previews (no video auto-play)

ac.title: Mobile Network Optimization
ac.given: mobile user on slow connection (3G, Save Data mode)
ac.then: network optimizations apply: Detect navigator.connection.saveData === true, if Save Data skip video assets use static thumbnails, if 3G reduce image quality (80%) defer non-critical assets, lazy load assets 200px margin (vs desktop 100px)

docs.doc: Mobile requirements: Vertical stack (no 3D perspective), swipe gestures (Framer Motion drag), device orientation tilt, tap to expand preview, double-tap to navigate. Simple fade-up scroll reveal (no complex transforms). Performance: 1K particles vs desktop 5K, disabled video previews by default, mobile-optimized srcset (480w, 800w), lazy loading. Frame rate ≥45fps on mid-range devices.

Tablet requirements: 2-column grid layout (2 columns, 1.5 rows, 3 cards total), gap 32px, reduced perspective 800px (vs desktop 1200px). Subtle 3D effects: tilt range ±8° (vs desktop ±15°, mobile disabled), shadow blur 20→40px on hover (vs desktop 40→60px), scale hover 1.0→1.03 (vs desktop 1.0→1.05). Touch + Mouse hybrid: tap = sticky hover state, double-tap = navigate, mouse hover effects on iPad Magic Keyboard. Performance: 2K particles, lazy load video with auto-play on viewport entry, tablet srcset (800w, 1200w). Frame rate ≥50fps.

Mobile detection (useIsMobile hook) → Render mobile-specific layout: vertical stack (no perspective container), Framer Motion drag for swipe gestures, useDeviceOrientation hook for gyroscope tilt (±5° range, 0-10px parallax), tap to expand preview + double-tap to navigate. Scroll reveal: simple fade-up (no complex transforms).

Mobile animation simplification: Reduce duration 400ms (vs desktop 800ms), disable 3D tilt effects, no mouse tracking on touch-only devices, GPU optimization (transform and opacity only). Pattern: fade-up reveal (opacity 0→1, translateY 40→0). Cleanup via gsap.context() for React, useEffect return must call ctx.revert().

Tailwind breakpoints: sm:640px, md:768px (tablet), lg:1024px (desktop), xl:1280px. Mobile-first approach: base = mobile, md: = tablet+, lg: = desktop+. Pattern: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6 lg:gap-8.

Single tap: Expand preview (modal-like fullscreen), double tap: Navigate to service page (prevent default browser zoom), long press (500ms): Show CTA options (Cal.com link in bottom sheet), swipe gestures: Framer Motion drag with dragConstraints, velocity-based card navigation. Touch targets: ≥44x44px (iOS), ≥48x48px (Android).

Frame rate: ≥45fps on mid-range devices (iPhone 12, Galaxy S21), JavaScript execution <100ms (excluding render), Image assets: mobile srcset (480w, 800w) WebP with JPEG fallback, Video: disabled by default, load on explicit tap. Network optimization: detect navigator.connection.saveData === true, skip videos if Save Data mode enabled.

code.artifact: Desktop 3D theater implementation (Story 4.1). Will be extended with responsive logic: useIsMobile/useIsTablet hooks for conditional rendering, mobile vertical stack vs tablet 2-column grid vs desktop 3D perspective. Mobile: disable PerspectiveContainer, use simplified fade-up animations. Tablet: reduced perspective (800px vs 1200px), reduced 3D effects (tilt ±8°, shadow 20→40px).

Mouse tracking for 3D tilt (desktop only). Mobile: disable entirely (touch-only device detection via window.matchMedia('(pointer: coarse)')). Tablet: reduce maxTilt from 15° to 8°, shadowMultiplier adjusted for subtler depth effects. Returns: {tiltX, tiltY, shadowX, shadowY, isHovered}.

GSAP ScrollTrigger timeline for desktop stagger reveal. Mobile: simplified timeline (fade-up only, duration 400ms vs 800ms, no complex transforms). Tablet: reduced complexity reveal (scale 0.9→1, translateY 60→0, stagger 100ms). Must add deviceCapabilities to dependencies array per review findings.

Desktop 3D card with perspective transforms. Mobile: create MobileSolutionCard variant (no 3D, vertical stack, touch gestures). Tablet: modify styles for reduced 3D (perspective 800px, tilt ±8°, scale 1.0→1.03 on hover). Touch interactions: tap = sticky hover, double-tap = navigate.

Mobile detection hook (viewport <768px, touch-only). Pattern: useState + useEffect with window.matchMedia('(max-width: 767px)'), addEventListener on mediaQuery change. Returns boolean isMobile. Used for conditional rendering of mobile vs desktop layouts.

Tablet detection hook (768px ≤ viewport < 1024px). Pattern: useState + useEffect with window.matchMedia('(min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 1023px)'). Returns boolean isTablet. Used for tablet-specific 2-column grid and reduced 3D effects.

Device gyroscope tilt hook (mobile only, optional enhancement). Uses DeviceOrientationEvent API, calculates tilt from beta/gamma angles (±5° range), applies parallax offset (0-10px). Fallback: check window.DeviceOrientationEvent, disable if unavailable. Returns: {tiltX, tiltY, isSupported}.

Simplified GSAP timeline for mobile. Pattern: gsap.context() with cleanup, fade-up animation (opacity 0→1, translateY 40→0, duration 400ms). Disable mouse tracking, check window.matchMedia('(pointer: coarse)') for touch-only. GPU optimization: only transform and opacity properties.

ecosystem.name: npm
ecosystem.package: Scroll-driven timelines, mobile simplified reveals. Mobile: reduce duration to 400ms, disable complex transforms. Tablet: stagger reveal with reduced complexity.
Touch gestures (drag, tap, double-tap), modal animations. Mobile: drag for swipe gestures, onTap for expand, velocity detection for card navigation. Tablet: hybrid touch/mouse interactions.
Smooth scroll foundation (global). Mobile: same Lenis instance, coordinate with simplified GSAP timelines. No changes needed.
Core framework. Hooks: useRef, useEffect, useState for device detection, useMemo for responsive calculations, useCallback for event handlers.
Navigation on card tap/click. Mobile: double-tap to navigate, prevent default zoom. Tablet: tap = sticky hover, double-tap = navigate. Desktop: click to navigate.
Responsive layouts. Mobile: flex flex-col gap-4, Tablet: md:grid md:grid-cols-2 md:gap-8, Desktop: lg:perspective-1200. Breakpoints: md:768px, lg:1024px.

constraints.constraint: Mobile-first approach: Base styles for mobile, md: for tablet (≥768px), lg: for desktop (≥1024px). Progressive enhancement: Desktop 3D → Tablet reduced 3D → Mobile 2D stack.

useIsMobile hook: window.matchMedia('(max-width: 767px)'), useIsTablet: window.matchMedia('(min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 1023px)'), touch detection: window.matchMedia('(pointer: coarse)') for touch-only devices.

Desktop: perspective 1200px, tilt ±15°, duration 800ms, 5K particles. Tablet: perspective 800px, tilt ±8°, duration 600ms, 2K particles. Mobile: no perspective, tilt disabled, duration 400ms, 1K particles.

Single tap: Expand preview (modal-like fullscreen). Double tap: Navigate to service page (prevent default zoom). Long press (500ms): Show CTA options (Cal.com link). Swipe gestures: Framer Motion drag with dragConstraints, velocity-based navigation.

Mobile: ≥45fps on mid-range devices (iPhone 12, Galaxy S21), JavaScript execution <100ms, image srcset (480w, 800w), video disabled by default (load on tap). Tablet: ≥50fps, 2K particles, lazy load video with auto-play on viewport entry, srcset (800w, 1200w).

Framer Motion: Touch gestures (drag, tap, double-tap), modal animations. GSAP ScrollTrigger: Simplified mobile reveal (no complex timelines). CSS Grid: Responsive layouts (1 col mobile → 2 col tablet → 3D desktop). Intersection Observer: Lazy loading with 200px margin (mobile), 100px (desktop).

TypeScript: tsc --noEmit clean (0 errors). ESLint: npm run lint (0 errors, warnings OK per project standards). Production build: npm run build succeeds. Bundle size: Theater code ≤100kb (mobile code adds ~20kb).

interfaces.interface: service: ServiceData, onTap: () => void, onDoubleTap: () => void, onLongPress: () => void, onSwipe: (direction: 'left' | 'right') => void, assetConfig?: PreviewAsset
services: ServiceData[], perspectiveValue: number (default 800px), gridColumns: number (default 2), touchEnabled: boolean (default true)
Returns: boolean (true if viewport <768px). Listens to window.matchMedia change events.
Returns: boolean (true if 768px ≤ viewport < 1024px). Listens to window.matchMedia change events.
Returns: {tiltX: number, tiltY: number, isSupported: boolean}. Uses DeviceOrientationEvent API, beta/gamma angles, ±5° range, 0-10px parallax offset.
Params: containerRef: RefObject<HTMLElement>, options?: {duration?: number (default 400ms), fadeDistance?: number (default 40px)}. Returns: void. Creates gsap.context() with cleanup.
icon: "Brain" | "Layers" | "Bot" | "Phone", title: string, description: string, link: string, color: string (hex for gradients/shadows). Used for all responsive variants.

tests.standards: Project has zero test infrastructure (Vitest/Jest/RTL/Playwright). Manual validation only per ARCHITECTURE.md technical debt. Focus: Functional correctness, visual QA, performance (Chrome DevTools, Lighthouse), basic usability (keyboard navigation). Explicitly excluded: Automated tests, WCAG audits, screen reader testing, axe DevTools (Visuals First philosophy).
tests.locations: No test directories. Manual testing: Chrome DevTools (Performance panel, Network tab, Device emulation), Lighthouse (mobile + desktop audits), Real devices (iPhone 12-14, Samsung Galaxy S21-22, iPad Pro, iPad Mini). QA screenshots saved to public/testing-screenshots/{date}/.

ideas.test: Mobile Layout & Interactions: DevTools emulate iPhone 12 (375px width), verify vertical stack layout (no 3D), test single tap (expand preview), double tap (navigate), long press (CTA modal), swipe left/right (card navigation). Check fade-up animation (opacity 0→1, translateY 40→0, 400ms). Verify ≥45fps via stats.js.

Device Orientation Tilt: Test on real iPhone with gyroscope, physically tilt device ±5°, verify parallax offset 0-10px, spring-back animation 200ms. Fallback: verify static cards if gyroscope unavailable (old Android).

Mobile Performance: Chrome DevTools throttle to 3G, verify 1K particles (vs desktop 5K), video disabled by default (load on tap only), image srcset (480w, 800w). FPS monitor: maintain ≥45fps on mid-range device emulation.

Tablet Layout & Effects: DevTools emulate iPad (768px width), verify 2-column grid (gap 32px), perspective 800px (inspect computed styles). Test reduced 3D: tilt ±8° on mouse move, shadow blur 20→40px on hover, scale 1.0→1.03. Touch: tap = sticky hover, double-tap = navigate. Mouse (iPad Magic Keyboard): hover effects + click navigate.

Tablet Scroll & Performance: Scroll to theater section, verify staggered reveal (Card 1: 0ms, Card 2: 100ms, Card 3: 200ms, opacity 0→1, scale 0.9→1, translateY 60→0, 600ms). FPS monitor: ≥50fps. Check 2K particles, lazy load video with auto-play on viewport entry, srcset (800w, 1200w).

Breakpoint Transitions: Drag browser width 375px→768px→1024px→1920px, verify smooth layout transitions (mobile→tablet→desktop). Check CLS <0.1 (no layout shift), transition duration 300ms ease-out. Verify ScrollTrigger.refresh() called on resize (console log).

Touch Target Accessibility: Inspect element dimensions, verify card tap area ≥44x44px (iOS), ≥48x48px (Android), CTA buttons ≥48x48px with 8px spacing, swipe hit zones full card width. Visual touch feedback: scale 0.98 on touchstart (100ms response time).

Orientation Change: Test on real device (iPhone/iPad), rotate portrait↔landscape. Mobile portrait: vertical stack (default), mobile landscape: horizontal carousel with snap scroll, tablet portrait: 2-column grid, tablet landscape: 3-column grid (desktop-like). Verify GSAP animations re-initialize on orientation change (console log).

Reduced Motion (Mobile): Chrome DevTools Rendering tab, emulate prefers-reduced-motion: reduce. Verify animations simplify: instant opacity change (no fade), no translateY movement, no tilt/parallax effects, static image previews (no video auto-play). Keyboard navigation remains functional.

Network Optimization: Chrome DevTools Network tab, throttle to 3G. Verify navigator.connection.saveData detection, if Save Data: skip video assets use static thumbnails, if 3G: reduce image quality (80%) defer non-critical assets, lazy load assets 200px margin (vs desktop 100px). Check optional "Lite Mode" indicator displays.
